name: opencl.vim
description: Script provides syntax highlight for OpenCL (Open Computing Language) syntax files (*.cl).
install_details:
Place file within /syntax
Edit filetype.vim:

add lines -  
" OpenCL
au BufNewFile,BufRead *.cl			setf opencl

Remove- (stop vim from recognizing *.cl as common lisp)
*.cl from Lisp
